column1: This Christmas I hope you're safe healthy and among people you love.  Here's to continuing the fight in 2020! https://t.co/kr1WpBjgBf
I didn't come to Congress to pick a fight with Trump but with your help maybe I can finish it. Please chip in a donation to support my campaign. https://t.co/skF6wze8UB https://t.co/8FVsYVZYVB

This year I'm thankful that with all that's going on in the world and in our lives I'm going to spend today with the people who mean most to me.  Happy Thanksgiving to you and yours! https://t.co/jHGlr19GwP

My door is always open for my brothers and sisters in labor.   Yesterday I met with the leaders of @SEIU521 and we discussed how legislation I’m working on like equal pay and ensuring worker’s rights to organize will deliver for working families. https://t.co/kARrEOIAY2
This isn't just about the climate. Dirty air kills. We must act so our kids can breathe. https://t.co/73srtGEV0s
Bryan’s part of a new generation of Central Valley leaders and I’m excited to work with him for years to come.

Today I picked up my paperwork to run for reelection as your Representative for the 21st District. The first signature to help me get on the ballot? Delano City Councilor Bryan Osorio. https://t.co/ZqpT0Um29n
I don't take serious decisions like this lightly but today there was only one way I could fulfill my duty to protect the Constitution. https://t.co/H2RyzjfScl
@DoloresHuerta @DoloresHuertaFD I had the honor of telling them just how proud I am of their work and let them know that I'm here to serve them.

.@DoloresHuerta is living history but she's not resting on her laurels. She and @DoloresHuertaFD are working every day not only to improve lives but also to empower a new generation of community organizers. https://t.co/u8eavH03kU

We MUST #ReformFirst if we have any hope of building a system that puts working families first. I'm glad folks are getting on board to support the #ForThePeople Act and fix our political system. @StopBigMoney https://t.co/DHIOGgYb9f

Proud to be in the first group of candidates to be endorsed for re-election in 2020! The people of the Central Valley work hard. They deserve leaders who will go to bat for them not for corporations and corporate priorities - that’s why I’m fighting every day #ForThePeople https://t.co/YR6JbjogGp

The President’s demonizing our immigrant communities is one reason they lost #CA21 last November (his plan to undermine our healthcare system was another). As the son of immigrants I will always stand with our immigrant neighbors against this reckless hateful rhetoric https://t.co/8NG9sO8Ydv
They are definitely keeping me grounded. Happy to continue to serve and looking forward to more debates to come
Unfortunately my kids were less than impressed. My son Tom  immediately texted back: “can you pick up my Boy Scout uniform :)”
They are definitely keeping me grounded. Happy to continue to serve and looking forward to more floor debates to come

We win when we engage voters on the issues that matter to them. We lose when we take the support of any group for granted. Dems have to deliver on the promises we made in 2018 and continue to engage those who chose us to lead  https://t.co/xb2xWpoqj3
We won by outworking our opponent - speaking to every voter we could in whatever language they knew best about the issues that matter most to them. And we aren’t stopping now https://t.co/LwNsKPxayt

On my flight back to DC this morning a TSA agent stopped me to thank me for my bill to provide 0% loans to federal workers. But it’s the thousands of TSA agents working without pay who ACTUALLY deserve gratitude: to each and every TSA employee working to keep us safe thank you
